TopicTitle: What mods does Robbaz use for the Cube?

Articles.Content:
I'm pretty sure some of you have seen the Cube series from Robbaz. I want to build my own cube. Does anyone know what mods he uses?

If you don't know, heres a vid. If you don't really care for language, then watch it. But if you're strong about language, DON'T WATCH ROBBAZ.

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/EiepJSx3BjY?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

Basically, I just want the mods from this video.

Also, if anyone can, can you get, or build, the cube and upload it? That would be awesome. Or if you know somewhere to find it, give me a link.

Thanks! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

Procedural parts, I think.

The "Master Cube" is just giant 2x panels.

Not sure about the white spots, though.
I think some of the parts are from B9, I had it installed once and parts from the cube were in it.
Indeed looks a lot like the large HX parts from B9 combined with rescaled stock structural panels.
You could always write a comment on one of his videos and ask him?
Rescaled with TweakScale, it looks like.

He used B9 aerospace for parts, ubiozur welding ltd to make it all one part to save fps and tweakscale to make it bigger than the original parts
